Building, Zoning, Code Enforcement, & Floodplain Management
The City of Starke is currently accepting applications to fill multiple seats on the Planning and Zoning Board.
As a board member, you will play an important role in guiding responsible development, reviewing zoning requests, and ensuring growth aligns with the City’s comprehensive plan. This is a unique opportunity to shape the future of land use and community planning in Starke.
Responsibilities include:
Reviewing site plans and zoning change applications
Making recommendations on land use and development matters
Participating in public hearings and board meetings
Ensuring zoning ordinances are applied fairly and consistently
No prior planning experience is required—just a commitment to public service and thoughtful decision-making.
The board meets once a month
at 5:30 PM
on the third Monday, with additional meetings scheduled only if necessary.
Apply for Planning & Zoning Board Seat
Welcome to the City of Starke’s Building & Zoning Department page! Here you’ll find helpful resources including all of our permits, forms, and frequently asked questions.
The City of Starke’s Building & Zoning Department’s office hours:
Monday-Thursday from 8 AM-4:30 PM
Closed on Fridays except by appointment only.
All
appointments must be made
24 hours in advance
.
To submit documents electronically or for building/zoning-related questions, please email
buildzone@cityofstarke.org
.
Due to ongoing phone outages, we are requesting Building & Zoning customers call our office cell at 904-930-3243.
If we are unable to answer, please leave a voicemail with your message, name, and number and we will return your call within a regular business day.

Skip the Drive,
Submit Your Documents Online!
FAQ’S
Does the city accept scanned permitting documents?
Yes for small scope projects!
Our most-used building permit applications are fillable online, and able to be sent electronically without having to visit the office.
What payments does the city accept for fees?
At this time, the city only accepts cash or check for fees.
When are building inspections done?
The city’s building inspector conducts inspections during the morning hours on
Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays
. Please be sure to schedule an inspection at least a day in advance.
What are the city’s impact fe
es?
The City of Starke has no impact fees for development of any kind.
How do I file a complaint for code enforcement?
Fill out our code enforcement complaint form in the forms section, and email it to buildzone@cityofstarke.org.
Please note that
Section 166.0415, Florida Statutes
prohibits local governments from investigating anonymous code compliance complaints, and further prohibits code compliance officers from initiating a potential violation investigation stemming from an anonymous complaint.
An individual MUST provide their name and address prior to an investigation occurring.
The City of Starke is currently updating our 2022 Permit Utilization Report and will have it posted on the website shortly.
